channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose car park logs, 3rd July
item.description:
Couple of the car park logs are loose & may need attention. Located in car park near the front of Westbere House.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 193, High Street, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Waste left by street cleaners, 3rd July
item.description:
Rubbish left from street sweeping last week. Presumably left to be collected by a van,which hasn't happened.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Drive, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped in park, 3rd July
item.description:
There are numerous black bin bags by the litter bin just as you come into Shrewsbury park, contains nappies and numerous other things Problem is if left rats and foxes will rip them open and items will be scattered in area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plum Lane, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cut back the weeds & remove the toy car, 3rd July
item.description:
Weeds need cutting on communal piece of grass near the side of No.1 Westbere House. Weeds are getting in the way of the drain near latter property. Clear away also red plastic toy car left on same piece of grass.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 193, High Street, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Car has been reported, 3rd July
item.description:
This cat has been reported over 6 weeks. It has had an orange investigation sticker put on it but it’s still there taking up valuable parking space. It clearly has been abandoned, please come and take it away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Connaught Drive, Temple Fortune, London

item.title: Overgrown tree outside no 146 Brimsdown Avenue, 3rd July
item.description:
Branches restricting view of road when exiting driveways. Branches also overhang footpath which is hazardous for pedestrians as they have grown to head height and above.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 136, Brimsdown Avenue, Ponders End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household furniture and gas bottles flytipped, 3rd July
item.description:
Household furniture, gas bottles and miscellaneous other items fly tipped in car park area on Poppy Close. I don’t know exactly when as Ice been away but it will have been Fly tipped in the last week. Hazardous to the children that play in this area. Your assistance is appreciated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Poppy Close, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: West Heath Road past the Whitestone Walk turning, 3rd July
item.description:
West Heath Road nr jct it Whitestone Walk. Coming up the hill there is a large drop pothole that caused a puncture in my car tyre which i have had to get replaced. I attach photos and urge this problem to be sorted out as soon as possible as it is incredibly dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pot holes and road damage, 3rd July
item.description:

item.title: Tree, 3rd July
item.description:
The roots of this tree are lifting the paving, it was repaired once before and tarmac laid but again this is lifting and causing a slope could you send a team out to repair paving
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shakespeare Road, West Heath, London
